what: Colour Your Plots With the MRC HGU Colour Theme
title: Colour Your Plots With the MRC HGU Colour Theme
text: Unofficial ggplot2 themes using colour palette MRC HGU logo. MRC Human Genetics Unit Powerpoint template comes preset colour theme controls colours elements presentation. creating plot ggplot2 possible set colour various parts various elements HGUTheme contains multiple functions help . always appropriate use colours (discussed ‘Get started’) appropriate HGUTheme allows easily create consistent colour theme presentations. palettes created align colour schemes MRC HGU palettes. However, original palettes designed use plots please consider effect colour choices colourblind people constructing plots. information making scientific plots colourblind friendly can found Colour Blind Friendly Plotting section.

title: Colour Your Plots With the MRC HGU Colour Theme
text: can install development version HGUTheme GitHub :

title: Colour Your Plots With the MRC HGU Colour Theme
text: Taken MRC HGU Powerpoint template: Dark blue: #2D2E5F Mid blue: #3A88A9 Light blue: #00BAD2 Taken MRC Powerpoint template: Dark Blue: #2E2C5E Darkish blue: #102F83 Mid blue: #305CEF Red: #D85941 Green: #4AA789 Yellow: #F1BE44 Gray: #DADADA

what: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n
title: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n
text: Access HEX codes colours interpolated used CRUK logo.

title: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n
code: cruk_colours_n(   n,   colours = cruk_colours(),   bias = 1,   space = "Lab",   interpolate = "linear",   alpha = FALSE,   ... )

title: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n
text: n number colours return. colours colours interpolate . default set blues UKRI logo. bias positive number. Higher values give widely spaced colours higher end colour spectrum. space character string indicating whether colours interpolated RGB CIE Lab colour spaces. interpolate character indicating whether spline linear interpolation method used. alpha logical value indicating whether alpha channel returned. ... Arguments passed grDevices::colorRampPalette.

title: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n
text: character vector colours iterpolated blues UKRI logo.

title: Interpolated HEX Codes of the CRUK Colours — cruk_colours_n

CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Continuous) — scale_colour_cruk_c
text: layer can added ggplot2 plots change colour aesthetic interpolate values blues used CRUK logo.

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Continuous) — scale_colour_cruk_c
code: scale_colour_cruk_c(   ...,   low = cruk_dark_blue(),   mid = cruk_light_blue(),   high = cruk_pink(),   midpoint = NULL,   space = "Lab",   na.value = cruk_grey(),   guide = "colourbar",   aesthetics = "colour" )

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Continuous) — scale_colour_cruk_c
text: ... Arguments passed ggplot2::scale_colour_gradient ggplot2::scale_colour_gradient2. low Colour low end gradient. mid Colour midpoit gradient. high Colour high end gradient. midpoint midpoint (data value) diverging scale. Diverging scale used midpoint equal NULL, default. space Colour space calculate gradient. na.value Colour used missing values. guide Type legend. aesthetics aesthetic apply scale .

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Continuous) — scale_colour_cruk_c
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Continuous) — scale_colour_cruk_c
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   data.frame(     x = runif(1500),     y = runif(1500)   ) ) +   aes(x = x, y = y, colour = x) +   geom_point() + theme_classic() +   guides(colour = "none") +   coord_equal() +   scale_colour_cruk_c()   ggplot(   data.frame(     x = runif(1500),     y = runif(1500)   ) ) +   aes(x = x, y = y, colour = x) +   geom_point() + theme_classic() +   guides(colour = "none") +   coord_equal() +   scale_colour_cruk_c(midpoint = 0.5)

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Discrete) — scale_colour_cruk_d
text: layer can added ggplot2 plots change colour aesthetic interpolate values colours used CRUK logo.

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Discrete) — scale_colour_cruk_d
code: scale_colour_cruk_d(   aesthetics = "colour",   scale_name = "CRUK_Colours",   palette = cruk_colours_palette_func_gen(),   name = ggplot2::waiver(),   breaks = ggplot2::waiver(),   labels = ggplot2::waiver(),   limits = NULL,   expand = ggplot2::waiver(),   na.translate = TRUE,   na.value = cruk_grey(),   drop = TRUE,   guide = "legend",   position = "left",   super = ggplot2::ScaleDiscrete )

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Discrete) — scale_colour_cruk_d
text: aesthetics names aesthetics scale works . scale_name name scale used error messages associated scale. palette palette function called single integer argument (number levels scale) returns values take. name name scale. Used axis legend title. waiver(), default, name scale taken first mapping used aesthetic. NULL, legend title omitted. breaks Passed ggplot2::discrete_scale(). labels Passed ggplot2::discrete_scale(). limits Passed ggplot2::discrete_scale(). expand Passed ggplot2::discrete_scale(). na.translate Setting FALSE remove NA values colour theme. na.value colour NA values drop unused factor levels omitted scale? guide function used create guide name. position position scale. super super class use constructed scale.

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Discrete) — scale_colour_cruk_d
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: CRUK Logo Colour Scales (Discrete) — scale_colour_cruk_d
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   data.frame(     x = runif(800),     y = runif(800),     col = sample(LETTERS[1:3], 800, replace = TRUE)   ) ) +   aes(x = x, y = y, colour = col) +   geom_point() + theme_classic() +   guides(colour = "none") +   coord_equal() +   scale_colour_cruk_d()

title: CRUK Logo Fill Scales (Continuous) — scale_fill_cruk_c
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   data.frame(     x = rnorm(10000),     y = rnorm(10000)   ) ) +   aes(x = x, y = y) +   geom_hex() + theme_classic() +   guides(fill = "none") + coord_equal() +   scale_fill_cruk_c()   ggplot(   data.frame(     x = rnorm(10000),     y = rnorm(10000)   ) ) +   aes(x = x, y = y) +   geom_hex() + theme_classic() +   guides(fill = "none") + coord_equal() +   scale_fill_cruk_c(midpoint = 40)

HGUTheme 0.0.1
text: HGUTheme v0.0.1 released Functions colour codes palette codes added. Functions discrete HGU blues added. Functions continuous HGU blues added. Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Created pkgdown documentation. Added ‘Getting started’ vignette.
